memberdef.definition: std::function<void(const juce::String& channelType, const juce::String& channelId)> MessageThreadComponent::onChannelClosed
memberdef.name: onChannelClosed

briefdescription.para: MessageThreadComponent displays a single conversation/chat thread.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
Header with channel name and back button
Scrollable list of messages (newest at bottom)
Message input field with send button
Message bubbles with different styling for sent/received
Typing indicators (future)
Read receipts (future)
